text: Ronnie Blake (born May 23, 1972) is a trumpeter from Fullerton, California. He has played with many well known musicians including Aaliyah, Ben Harper, Dr Dre, and Big Bad Voodoo Daddy. Blake has also toured with Green Day. Category:American trumpeters Category:Green Day members Category:Musicians from California Category:1972 births Category:Living people
title: Ronnie Blake
